Type.Name: UISignalConnectFunc

TypeSignature.Value: public sealed delegate void UISignalConnectFunc (Gnome.UIInfo uiinfo, string signal_name, Gnome.UIBuilderData uibdata);

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: Are called as a result of signals being emitted from a menu or tool bar item

remarks.para: Delegates of this type are given as the first element of a instance.
uiinfo : The user data that was part of the instance.
signal_name : The name of the emitted signal.
uibdata : The user data that was part of the relevant instance.
